action.name: Multiattack
entries: The decapus makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tentacles.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature grappled by the decapus. Hit: 7 (2d4+2) piercing damage.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 24 (9d4+2) bludgeoning damage or 14 (5d4+2) bludgeoning damage if the decapus is grappling a creature other than the target or if the decapus is on the ground or floor. The target is also grappled (escape DC 14) unless the decapus is already grappling a creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained.

trait.name: Boulder Guise
entries: While fully withdrawn into its shell, the geonid can't see and is indistinguishable from a small boulder

action.name: Club
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4+1) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Stone Tell
entries: The geonid touches a stone object or surface and knows what types of creatures have been within 10 feet of that stone in the past 24 hours. The geonid can also determine the number of creatures of each type, but not their identities.

monster.name: Topi
monster.languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Turn Resistance
entries: The topi has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the topi to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5+the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the topi drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Venomous Claws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of the target's next turn.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The tortle can hold its breath for 1 hour.

action.name: Claws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) slashing damage.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d8+2) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d8) piercing piercing damage.

action.name: Shell Defense
entries: The tortle withdraws into its shell. Until it emerges, it gains a +4 bonus to AC and has advantage on Strength and Constitution saving throws. While in its shell, the tortle is prone, its speed is 0 and can't increase, it has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws, it can't take reactions, and the only action it can take is a bonus action to emerge.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The tortle is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following druid spells prepared:

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The tortle can hold its breath for 1 hour.

action.name: Claws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) slashing damage.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d8+2) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands.

action.name: Shell Defense
entries: The tortle withdraws into its shell. Until it emerges, it gains a +4 bonus to AC and has advantage on Strength and Constitution saving throws. While in its shell, the tortle is prone, its speed is 0 and can't increase, it has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws, it can't take reactions, and the only action it can take is a bonus action to emerge.
